thread.title: Brokers target Burberry after sales miss first-half targets
thread.title_full: Brokers target Burberry after sales miss first-half targets

author: Tara Cunningham
title: Brokers target Burberry after sales miss first-half targets
text: Market Report Brokers target Burberry after sales miss first-half targets Shares in Burberry fell for a second day, hurt by a slew of broker notes slashing the stock's target price and a profit warning from Hugo Boss. A slew of brokers slashed the target price of Burberry after sales missed H1 expectations. Photo: Burberry By Tara Cunningham , Business Reporter 11:54AM BST 16 Oct 2015
